Yosha

How to Play

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • 'z' to jump
  • 'x' to shoot;
  • Use the 'up' key to aim upwards
  • 'up' to enter portal
  • 'm' and 'p' or buttons to mute and pause

Goal:

Eggify all enemies then find and enter the portal

How to Play

Controls:

  • 'ad' keys to move sideways
  • 'l' to jump
  • 'k' to shoot;
  • Use the 'w' key to aim upwards
  • 'w' to enter portal
  • 'm' and 'p' or buttons to mute and pause

Goal:

Eggify all enemies then find and enter the portal

About

Yoshi is lost, but the neighbors in this town seem to not be very friendly! Help Yoshi egg some sense into these troublemakers, then find the portal back to his home.

Yosha is a 2D action game based on platform games like the Mario series and shooter games like Contra.
